title: CRM Opportunity

xdm:name.title: Opportunity Name
xdm:name.description: Subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

xdm:description.title: Opportunity Description
xdm:description.description: Additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

xdm:stage.title: Opportunity Stage
xdm:stage.description: Sales stage of this opportunity to aid the sales team in their efforts to win this opportunity.

xdm:fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
xdm:fiscalYear.description: Fiscal Year this opportunity is targeted.

xdm:fiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
xdm:fiscalQuarter.description: Fiscal Quarter this opportunity is targeted..

xdm:hasOpportunityLineItem.title: Has Opportunity Line Item
xdm:hasOpportunityLineItem.description: Flag to indicate whether this opportunity have more line items.

xdm:probabilityPercentage.title: Probability Percentage
xdm:probabilityPercentage.description: Likelihood that opportunity will close, stated as a percentage.

xdm:isClosed.title: Closed
xdm:isClosed.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is closed.

xdm:isWon.title: Won
xdm:isWon.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is Won.

xdm:closeDate.title: Close Date
xdm:closeDate.description: Date of closure for this opportunity.

xdm:nextStep.title: Next Step
xdm:nextStep.description: Description of next task in closing opportunity.

xdm:lastActivity.title: Last Activity
xdm:lastActivity.description: Last activity captured for this sales opportunity.

xdm:isprivate.title: Private
xdm:isprivate.description: Indicates that the opportunity is private.

xdm:contractId.title: Contract Id
xdm:contractId.description: Contract unique Identifier reference that this opportunity is linked to.

xdm:forcastCategory.title: Forecast Category
xdm:forcastCategory.description: Forecast Category determined by the opportunity Stage value eg: omitted,pipeline,bestcase,commit,closed.

xdm:forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
xdm:forecastCategoryName.description: Forecast category name that is displayed in reports for a perticular forecast category.

xdm:expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
xdm:expectedRevenue.description: Calculated revenue based on the Amount and Probability.
